amendment.description: To amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the National Transportation Safety Board for fiscal years 2011 and 2012, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S3765) To amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the National Transportation Safety Board for fiscal years 2011 and 2012, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
